title: Help w/ download
body: I recently got a new Windows laptop and I'm trying to download the game again. Once it gets to the loading screen it says "client update" but mid-way of download it would stop and say "unspecified error occurred. Please check logs for more information." what do I do?

replies.body: There's a chance that the client is attempting to start that update, but Windows doesn't recognize the program and shuts it down juuuuuust in case it's a virus. I know I know, dumb OS's. It happens sometimes if you don't have all the right [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) in place, so double check those settings and let me know if that doesn't help!

Thank you so much! It happened to be that I didn't have permission and I changed the settings. Again, thank you so much!
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
